channel.title: Stop Spammers?
channel.description: AnyWay To Stop FLooders, Crashers, Spammer? if you do please!!!! i beg you please!!!! share with me!!! i am tired of stupid migits spamming my server!!

item.title: Stop Spammers?
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

Well, this may work for other Syi spammers that use invalid names like X__bitch___1 and shit like that but imo its worthless, the one connection per ip is two times better

Just add this in your client.java

public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); }

Read full topic

AnyWay To Stop FLooders, Crashers, Spammer? if you do please!!! i beg you please!!! share with me!!! i am tired of stupid migits spamming my server!!
